Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the number of consecutive balanced budgets achieved.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to back up the statement of achieving four consecutive balanced budgets.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there were deficits in the first two fiscal years that Gingrich helped shape as speaker.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Gingrich was solely responsible for balancing the budget, ignoring the contributions of other individuals or factors.
Falters at times: The claim falters in accurately representing Gingrich's role in balancing the budget, as he had no role in assembling or shepherding two of the budgets mentioned.
